title: Boyden Elects New Directors to Global Board in Support of Market Growth
text:
Frankfurt and New York, May 17, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Boyden , a premier global talent and leadership advisory firm with more than 65 offices in over 40 countries, today announced two new members of its Global Board, elected at Boyden’s annual partner meeting in Frankfurt.
Carita Lahti, a Managing Partner in Boyden Finland and member of the firm’s Global CEO & Board Services Practice, was elected as a new board member and will serve as Boyden’s EMEA Regional Director. Robert Travis, a Managing Partner in Canada and the United States and Leader of Boyden’s Global Industrial Practice, was also elected as a board member and will serve as the firm’s Americas Regional Director.
“Boyden’s Global Board is continually monitoring and evaluating our clients’ needs for transformative leadership in a changing world of disruption and evolving markets,” said Jörg Kasten , Chairman of Boyden and Managing Partner, Boyden Germany. “Carita and Robert are great additions to our board, bringing unique skills to help us continue on our growth trajectory globally and in the sectors we serve.”
Carita Lahti, EMEA Director and Board Member : As a key member of the Global Consumer & Retail, Industrial, and CEO & Board Services Practices, Lahti leads board and C-level searches, as well as conducting board and leadership consulting assignments. Her client portfolio comprises national and international organizations of all sizes, including publicly listed, family-owned, private equity- and venture capital-owned concerns. She holds a master’s degree in sociology from Helsinki University and a licentiate of technology from the Helsinki University of Technology.
Robert Travis, Americas Director and Board Member : Travis, who previously served three terms as a Boyden Board Member from 2007 to 2013, serves as Leader of Boyden’s Global Industrial Practice. He is a Managing Partner in both Canada and the U.S., and focuses primarily on the manufacturing, fabrication, energy/energy services and technology sectors. A citizen of both Canada and the U.S., he is attuned to the subtle differences in leadership requirements in each country, and specializes in serving clients with business interests in both markets. He holds a bachelor’s degree from Stetson University in Florida.
In April, for the second consecutive year, Forbes ranked Boyden in the top ten among 250 organizations on its new list of Best Executive Recruiting Firms .
About Boyden
Boyden is a premier leadership and talent advisory firm with more than 65 offices in over 40 countries. Our global reach enables us to serve client needs anywhere they conduct business. We connect great companies with great leaders through executive search, interim management and leadership consulting solutions. For further information, please visit www.boyden.com .
Robert Travis has been elected Boyden’s Americas Director and Global Board Member
Carita Lahti is Boyden’s new EMEA Director and Global Board Member
